name: Less Is More 3D
description:
I'm a 3d designer having a experience of 4 years and has currently switched to UNITY 3d from 4 months. This is My 1st Game Jam I've ever participated on the theme was less is more and I came up with an Idea and started working on it .

The project is far from being complete I could've done much better but due to lack of time I've to stop here

STORY

The world has be captured by the zombies but these zombies are cute so the humans are not able to kill them. So they created a Robot(YOU) from broken Iron parts so that you can fight from the zombies without getting emotional . You loose your health every step you took so THE LESS YOU MOVE MORE HEALTH YOU HAVE(theme) you have to save your health by not moving and killing the enemies and Regaining Health 

Your Main Objective is to close the 5 PORTALS present in your city so that after that you can live peacefully

CREDITS

All the models and environments are made by myself . I've followed many Tutorials from You tube only the music is taken from You tube Audio Library

If anyone of you have any Doubt or If anyone is intrested in knowing how I made the game in 7 days I'll soon upload an Devlog on my channel You can check the whole progress there
